thag4.7:1.1: Hurrying when it’s time to dawdle;
thag4.7:1.2: dawdling when it’s time to hurry;
thag4.7:2.2: like the moon in the waning fortnight.
thag4.7:3.1: Dawdling when it’s time to dawdle;
thag4.7:3.2: hurrying when it’s time to hurry;
thag4.7:3.4: an astute person comes into happiness.
thag4.7:4.2: like the moon in the waxing fortnight.
